channel.title: Client wont run
channel.description:
When I run the client the command thing stays black and the client stays on 1% loaded. What could be causing this? I'm using OptimusScape 667 loading 711
Run Code is:
[code]@echo off @title OptimusScape client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause[/code]

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

You didn’t make me mad. I was just saying people can’t help you if you don’t pay close attention to deatils. I also was familiar with 317’s back in 2008 and recntly got back into it. so all of this new code is new to me. Can’t forget our roots. haha

Read full topic

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

Sorry dude it’s been a long time since I’ve been around here, I only know how 317’s work. I see this guy put out a nice looking hd server and wanted to see how it was and just have a little bit of fun, I didn’t know things got so complex. I don’t even have MYSQL or know how it works with servers. Sorry for pissing you off.

Read full topic

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

I’m sorry I can’t assist someone who doesn’t desire to learn java and read simple instructions. Not trying to be mean but If you can’t read the instructiosn people try to help you with then nobody can help you! I will repeat myself again You need to read the readme inside of the client. Then for the MySQL errors inside the server find a tut.

Read full topic

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

there is no anti leech in this server

Read full topic

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

gtree01:

You need to point the cache version and cache.zip within the client to your webserver containing said files. Read the guide that came with the server. It’s called an anti leech to prevent leechers from taking it hosting it and making $ with no programming knowledge at all. Also You need to fix the MySQL within the server. Have fun. Also There are little to no guides on how to program a 667/711.

Did you not read. Read the Bold part.

Read full topic

item.title: Client wont run
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

Is there a tutorial on how to do this somewhere?

Read full topic
